channel.title: Abouts on Ethan Ho
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Ethan Ho

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Ethan, a current student at Stanford University. I play CTFs with various teams (including idek and .;,;.) and compete in the International Cybersecurity Championship on the United States team. Also, I am the founder of ImaginaryCTF, a community that produces daily CTF challenges for the community to learn and practice. On this blog, I post occasional writeups of CTF challenges, as well as other topics (sometimes). Hope you enjoy your time here!
